description:
This course will give you a foundational knowledge on how to start your own business, with a focus on tech related businesses.

If you have mobile app, website, software or just an idea and want to turn it into a successful and profitable business, then this is the course for you!

In this course, we're going to look at what it means to take an idea and make a business model out of it. We'll also dive into product or service creation.

Once we have all that covered, we get into selling and marketing and then weâ€™ll explore different types of funding, from debt to equity and more.
title: The Startup: How to Start Your Own Successful Business
